magic_remote_help.message: This is magicremote (mouse and keyboard) experimental features page. Use mouse to move pointer on TV. When TV system keyboard active and TV edit control takes a focus, text editor appears above the 'mouse pad'. You can edit text and press enter to send text input to TV. To move PC mouse without moving TV pointer please hold Ctrl key or move cursor out of pad. TV pointer speed increases when mouse cursor in dark grey area. PC Home button works as TV Home. Cursor arrows works as TV remote arrows and allows to move TV pointer as well.

purchase_message.message: You don't have a valid license or your trial period is expired. Please consider purchasing an extension.

suggest_purchase_message.message: Dear User, recently this extension became commercial, but for you it remains free as we do appreciate our loyal users using it from the very beginning:) However, if you like this extension, you can support us and further development by buying a license. Would you like to buy a license?
